value: The Kingdom of Avior has been at peace for the last few centuries. Political stability felt almost taken for granted not only by citizens, but even by royalty.
Military successes of the previous king, Mizar, provided his family with a big and strong country, which rightfully ruled to this day.
His son and successor, Alcor, reinforced his father's achievements and continued his rulership.
As it happens in a monarchy, his first son, Norbert, prepared to take his place, given his father’s old age.
However, in his twenties, the second prince Arron is nothing but trouble to his family...
My Lady, it's a great honor for me to be invited into your bedroom.
Huhu, enough Arron, just come inside already.
(Jeez, what is master even thinking to go at it again...)
(Oh, they went in. I better take my position. Sigh...)
I've been dreaming of this day since our last meeting, and my heart skipped once I'd noticed your beautiful lustful eyes on me this morning...
You and your flattering again... Gosh, why are you already naked?
Arron recognized the signal, his servant, Rose, was instructed to give.
Oh, it completely slipped my mind.
Norbert had jammed the door after last time.
Norbert and a few guards barge into the room. As he sees his naked wife, rage quickly engulfs his face.
Dear, what are you doing? I had been taking a nap so nicely. Why have you brought these people into our love nest?
Check all cabinets, and look under the bed!
There's nothing under the bed, m'lord.
No way! He couldn't have gotten away again, keep looking.
Hmph, if only you were this zealous at nights as you are right now.
I know how it looks, but it wasn't me.
Ouch, stop dragging me, I can walk on my own!
(Uh-oh.. this didn't go well. I better follow them...)
Arron, with his hands tied behind his back sits on the floor of a large cell. Norbert observes him, while his subordinates prepare for a ritual.
Rose hides among the shadows of a far corner, unnoticed.
You know, it was funny when you convinced the Pope that Aunt Mary had been possessed by the devil so he brought a whole ceremony for them.
Everyone knows old people are evil. That's why they still are with us and not with God.
...it also was rather amusing when you brought a bunch of homeless people during negotiations with Reines and insisted that you will become their king in a new nation in our dinning hall.
Bob could also replace me as a King.
You are not taking this seriously, are you? Tell me, were you really not satisfied with all those palace maids and feudal daughters? Why go after my wife?
Dunno, you went for her for some reason. You don't know either?
THAT WAS THE ONLY REASON!? Because she's MY wife?
Nah, she also seemed quite delighted with my company. I mean, how can you ignore someone who eagerly woos you?
Shut the hell up, I'm not going to hear from you that my wife is unfaithful.
Your wildness had been ignored by father way too many times.
Hah. So what you gonna do? You can't kill or imprison me. Everyone will realize you did it, and the people won't like it.
True. Even though many nobles find your behavior displeasing, killing you isn’t really worth it. You have to disappear.
... What? This is what you are preparing?
As they kept talking, a number of magical runes across the floor began to glow.
Yes and we are about to finish. This portal spell will send you where you won't be causing us more troubles ever again.
Arron's eyes widened with surprise and disbelief.
(Uh, shit, he seems to actually be serious this time.)
Hey, stop it, Norb, father will know!
Nobody will know, and nobles will confirm that you just disappeared during the night. Everyone will be happier without you around.
(Oh, no, I have to do something!)
Farewell, Arron, you were a huge pain in the ass all these years.
Portal runes shine with incredible brightness when Rose runs out of hiding, trying to push Arron away from it.
Just as she enters the circle, the spell completes, revealing the empty space where once was two people.
Huh... was that his slave? Well, one less witness to worry about. Clean it all up, I'll prepare to make a report for father.
In the middle of an empty desert two bodies appear on the ground.
Ouch... Damn it, Rose you are an idiot!
Ugh. What is this place? Where are we?
Hell if I know. Untie me already.
Arron barely managed to get up with his hands still tied behind his back.
Why? I ask you, why jump in, you moron? In what universe did that seem like a good idea?
I'm sorry, Master... I just... couldn't hold back.
Forget it. Now, what is this place?
The couple takes a long look at their surroundings, finding only desert and rocks.
Shit, I really shouldn't have slept during those geography lessons.
Norb will really pay for this once I get back.
First I'll have to take care of those suspicious guys with him...
I think it will be better if we start moving.
Yeah, it doesn’t seem like anyone will be coming to helping us any time soon. Let's go.
Anywhere! I'm free now, so I can go anywhere I want, Mwahaha!
(Despite the situation, looks like Master had returned to his normal mood pretty quick. That's a relief...)
Hmmm... It was midnight when we were at the castle, but it’s noon here, that must mean...
No, we must be very far away from the kingdom.
Bullshit, you’re telling me time travel isn't real now?
So I’ll never be able to become my own grandfather?
